organic.title: Utah Region - American Red Cross
organic.snippet: The American Red Cross Utah Region is a non-profit organization that provides disaster relief and helps people during disasters.

organic.title: Locations | Utah - American Red Cross
organic.snippet: The American Red Cross of Utah has 4 local offices and 4 blood donation centers. Find contact information here.

organic.title: Salt Lake Red Cross Blood, Platelet and Plasma Donation Center
organic.snippet: 6616 South 900 East · Red Cross blood, platelet and plasma donation center. Schedule an appointment today 1-800-Red CROSS.

organic.title: About Us | Utah Region - American Red Cross
organic.snippet: We deliver services across the state via the Greater Salt Lake Area Chapter; the Northern Utah Chapter; and the Central & Southern Utah Chapter. The beginning ...

organic.title: American Red Cross | Help Those Affected by Disasters
organic.snippet: Every 8 minutes the American Red Cross responds to an emergency. Support the Red Cross. Join us today by making a donation.
